Package inkball

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    This the main class which represents the game window, inheriting the PApplet class from the Processing library to handle drawing graphics.
    Ball
    Represents the balls seen in the game.
    Blank
    Child class of Tile.
    Hole  
    Line
    Represents user-drawn lines and all other (invisible/visible) surfaces that the ball could collide against, such as the surfaces of walls.
    Spawner
    Child class of Tile.
    Tile
    Represents a tile on the game board.
    Wall
    This is the child class of Tile.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    App.GameState
    Represents the game state mode.
    Hole.GridPosition
    Defines enum called GridPosition for the position of the tile on a 2x2 space TL=TopLeft, BL=BottomLeft, TR=TopRight, BR=BottomRight
